Package game.attributes

Interface CollidingObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
SolidCollider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AIPlayer, CrushingPlatform, MindlessAI, MovingPlatform, Platform, Player, PlayerMP, TimerPlatform
public interface CollidingObject

Interface to be implemented by any object with a collision interaction
This is a general purpose collider interface, extend this with any specific types of collisions (e.g. SolidCollider)

In the constructor 
CollidingObject.addCollider(this);
In the tick method 
CollidingObject.getCollisions(this);

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.LinkedList<CollidingObject> colliders
    A LinkedList maintaining all classes implementing CollidingObject
    (all objects that could collide with each other)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addCollider​(CollidingObject object)
    Adds a CollidingObject to the colliders list.
    Should be called in the constructor of a class implementing CollidingObject
    java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
    A required function for all classes extending CollidingObject.
    static void getCollisions​(CollidingObject object)
    Checks for bounding box collisions between a given object and all other CollidingObject classes
    Calls the object's collision handler with a list of CollidingObject classes with which it intersects
    void handleCollisions​(java.util.LinkedList<CollidingObject> collisions)
    A required function for all classes extending CollidingObject.
    This is called when a collision is detected on a given object
    static void removeCollider​(CollidingObject object)  

  • Field Details

    • colliders

      static final java.util.LinkedList<CollidingObject> colliders
      A LinkedList maintaining all classes implementing CollidingObject
      (all objects that could collide with each other)

  • Method Details

    • addCollider

      static void addCollider​(CollidingObject object)
      Adds a CollidingObject to the colliders list.
      Should be called in the constructor of a class implementing CollidingObject
      Parameters:
      object - The object to be added to the colliders list

    • removeCollider

      static void removeCollider​(CollidingObject object)

    • getCollisions

      static void getCollisions​(CollidingObject object)
      Checks for bounding box collisions between a given object and all other CollidingObject classes
      Calls the object's collision handler with a list of CollidingObject classes with which it intersects
      Parameters:
      object - The object you want to check for collisions. This is also the object whose collision handler will be called

    • handleCollisions

      void handleCollisions​(java.util.LinkedList<CollidingObject> collisions)
      A required function for all classes extending CollidingObject.
      This is called when a collision is detected on a given object
      Parameters:
      collisions - The list of collisions at any one time - this can be used to perform different actions based on the objects collided with

    • getBounds

      java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      A required function for all classes extending CollidingObject.
      Returns:
      A Rectangle showing the bounds of an object. Typically 
      return new Rectangle((int)this.x, (int)this.y, this.width, this.height);
